title: Impulse - two intervals on force vs time graph

content.question: A block of unknown mass initially at rest experiences a net force as shown in the graph. Consider the change in momentum <math alttext="delta p sub 01" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>p</mi><mn>01</mn></msub></mstyle></math> on the interval from <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> to <math alttext="t equals 1.0 second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math> and the change in momentum <math alttext="delta p sub 23" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>p</mi><mn>23</mn></msub></mstyle></math> on the interval from <math alttext="t equals 2.0 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math> to <math alttext="t equals 3.0 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>. Which statement describes the relationship between <math alttext="delta p sub 01" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>p</mi><mn>01</mn></msub></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="delta p sub 23" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>p</mi><mn>23</mn></msub></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="delta p sub 01 is less than delta p sub 23" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>p</mi><mn>01</mn></msub><mo><</mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>p</mi><mn>23</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta p sub 01 equals delta p sub 23" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>p</mi><mn>01</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>p</mi><mn>23</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta p sub 01 is greater than delta p sub 23" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>p</mi><mn>01</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>p</mi><mn>23</mn></msub></mstyle></math>
No relationship can be determined since the mass is unknown.

content.answer: <math alttext="delta p sub 01 is less than delta p sub 23" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>p</mi><mn>01</mn></msub><mo><</mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>p</mi><mn>23</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
